item.title: Etihad updates baggage policy and fare structure
item.description:
Source: Etihad. The national airline of the United Arab Emirates, Etihad Airways, is rolling out a new, clearer fare system starting September 14, 2015. This system aims to offer travelers more choices when booking their flights. Eight new “Fare Choices” will be introduced, allowing travelers to customize their bookings to fit their needs. These transparent Fare Choices come with different baggage allowances, levels of flexibility, and included benefits that previously needed to be purchased separately...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-updates-baggage-policy-and-fare-structure/
